title: 怎么用命令方块破坏方块？求大神回答
author: xiaohai

replies.author: jjxxz2
replies.txt_content:
/setblock x y z 方块ID metadata destroy复制代码
如果不想要触发BUD可以用下面的
/setblock x y z 方块ID metadata replace复制代码

另，METAdata是 方块ID后面冒号的数字

求最佳答案

replies.author: 1123fff
replies.txt_content:
